# Starburst (Spell)
## Overview
[[Evocation Spells|Evocation]] \[[[Force Spells|force]], [[Good Spells|good]]]

**Level:** [[4th Level Cleric Spells|Cleric 4]], [[4th Level Druid Spells|Druid 4]], [[4th Level Ranger Spells|Ranger 4]], [[3rd Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 3]], [[3rd Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 3]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 8th-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 8]], [[BoXM 8th-Level Druid Spells List|Druid 8]], [[BoXM 6th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 6]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S

**Range:** Close (25 ft. + 5 ft./2 levels)

**Target:** See text

**Duration:** 1 minute/level (D)

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** Yes

**Source:** Champions of Valor (WotC)Â­, pg. 58

You create one twinkling star per level (maximum ten stars). These minute starbursts orbit your head like *ioun stones.* As a swift action, you can launch one star at a target you designate within range. Alternatively, as a standard action, you can launch up to three stars at one or more targets within range. You can only launch stars once per round. You must make a ranged touch attack for each star.

Against non-evil targets, each star deals 1d8 points of nonlethal damage; evil targets take 1d8 points of lethal damage instead.

**GM Note**

*House Rule:* Name changed from *stars of Arvandor* to *starburst* for continuity..
